name: Block Dash - Tricky Puzzles
description:
This is the best classic puzzle game that you will ever play. The concept is very simple jet addicting and challenging. Fill up the grid with shapes as the block indicates. The game gets harder and harder as you progress trough the levels.

How to play:

Touch and hold to move from a colored block to paint a new one.
The entire grid should all be filled.
Blocks with shapes indicates that you must draw the shapes as the block indicates.

Ready for the challenge? Download the game now for free and start playing to become the best!
